document_api_meta.title: Creator Search Affiliate Trace Orders
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of affiliate orders generated by a creator, returning the order ID and the product ID. Using this, the partner can track their affiliate-conversions on behalf of a creator, using the order ID.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The creator access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 1. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a362dccb8030ea6f98c) to get creator access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. Default: 20
Valid Range: [1-100]

request_body_param.name: time_ge
request_body_param.desc:
Filter orders to include only those with the specified `time_type` timestamp greater than or equal to time_ge and less than time_lt. Unix timestamp.
Note:
`time_ge` and `time_lt` together constitute the creation time filter condition.

request_body_param.name: time_lt
request_body_param.desc: Filter orders to include only those with the specified `time_type` timestamp greater than or equal to time_ge and less than time_lt.Unix timestamp.

request_body_param.name: time_type
request_body_param.desc:
Specifies the type of timestamp to filter the orders by. The query time range (time_ge and time_lt) will be applied to the selected time type.
Possible values:
- PAY_TIME: Filter based on the order payment time.
- DELIVERY_TIME: Filter based on the order delivery/shipment time.
- SETTLE_TIME: Filter based on the order settlement time.
- CREATE_TIME (default): Filter based on the order creation time.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^orders
response_param.desc: The order resource.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The order identifier.

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The current status of the order. Possible options are:
- UNSPECIFIED: The status of the order is undefined. It might be updated later.
- ORDERED: The order has been placed, but the commission has not been settled. But an estimated commission is available.
- SETTLED: The commission of the order is already settled.
- REFUNDED: The order has been returned/refunded/canceled by the buyer, and no commission will be settled.
- FROZEN: Possible fraud has been detected regarding the order. The commission will be unfrozen after the fraud is resolved.
- DEDUCTED: Additional deduction from your balance account.

response_param.name: ^^skus
response_param.desc: A list of SKUs associated with the order.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The SKU identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^product_id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^price
response_param.desc: An object representing the localized price of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The value of the price associated with the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code of the price associated with the product.

response_param.name: ^^^quantity
response_param.desc: The total number of SKUs per order, calculated by aggregating the number of ordered product SKUs associated with the order.

response_param.name: ^^^commission_rate
response_param.desc: The commission rate associated with the collaboration. Expressed in units of hundredths of a percent formatted as a string. The percent sign % is not included in the string. For example, 3000 represents a 30% commission.

response_param.name: ^^^estimated_commission_base
response_param.desc: An object representing the estimated base commission at the time of order creation.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The estimated commission base amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_commission
response_param.desc: An object representing the actual base commission, calculated by multiplying the actual commission base by the commission rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The actual commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^shop_ads_commission_rate
response_param.desc: The commission rate received by a creator for a sale associated with a specific piece of content. Expressed in units of hundredths of a percent formatted as a string. The percent sign % is not included in the string. For example, 3000 represents a 30% commission.

response_param.name: ^^^commission_bonus_rate
response_param.desc: The commission bonus rate associated with the collaboration. Expressed in units of hundredths of a percent formatted as a string. The percent sign % is not included in the string. For example, 3000 represents a 30% commission.

response_param.name: ^^^product_name
response_param.desc: The product name in the TikTok Shop.

response_param.name: ^^^shop_name
response_param.desc: The name of the TIkTok Shop in which the product is offered for sale.

response_param.name: ^^^returned_quantity
response_param.desc: The total number of returned SKUs associated with the order.

response_param.name: ^^^refunded_quantity
response_param.desc: The total number of refunded SKUs associated with the order.

response_param.name: ^^^campaign_id
response_param.desc: The campaign identifier associated with the order.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_commission_base
response_param.desc: An object representing the actual commission base, calculated by multiplying the product sale price by the number of products sold, subtracting returned and refunded orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The value of the actual commission base.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_shop_ads_commission
response_param.desc: An object representing the actual shop ads commission, calculated by multiplying the commission base by the shop_ads_commission_rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The actual shop ads commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^estimated_shop_ads_commission
response_param.desc: An object representing the estimated shop ads commission, calculated by multiplying the estimated commission base by the shop_ads_commission_rate

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The estimated shop ads commission rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^estimated_bonus_commission
response_param.desc: An object representing the estimated bonus commission, calculated by multiplying the estimated commission base by the commission bonus rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The estimated bonus commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^delivery_time
response_param.desc: Time and date order delivered, UTC+0 timing

response_param.name: ^^^creator_commission_reward_rate
response_param.desc: The commission reward rate affiliate partners allocate to creators

response_param.name: ^^^estimated_creator_commission_reward_fee
response_param.desc: Estimated creator commission reward fee.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The estimated fee creators receive from affiliate partners through commission rewards

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_creator_commission_reward_fee
response_param.desc: Actual creator commission reward fee.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The actual fee creators receive from affiliate partners through commission rewards

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^content_type
response_param.desc:
The content format of the creator content through which the order was created.
Possible values:
- SHOP
- VIDEO
- LIVE
- PRE_LIVE
- PROMOTION_PAGE
- LINKSHARE

response_param.name: ^^^content_id
response_param.desc: The content identifier for the creator content through which the order was created.

response_param.name: ^^^trace
response_param.desc: Extra information for tracing purposes.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: When `trace.type==GENERAL`, the value is {eid} you provided in `sharing_link`; when `trace.type==SPECIFIC`, the value is the same as `publisher_id`.

response_param.name: ^^^^type
response_param.desc: For the orders coming from the sharing links for specific publishers, the value is `SPECIFIC`; for the orders coming from the general sharing links, the value is `GENERAL`.

response_param.name: ^^^estimated_commission
response_param.desc: The estimated creator commission, calculated by multiplying the product sales price by the total number of products at the time of order creation.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The estimated commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^^actual_bonus_commission
response_param.desc: An object representing the actual bonus commission, calculated by multiplying the actual commission base by the commission bonus rate.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: The actual bonus commission amount.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code.

response_param.name: ^^create_time
response_param.desc: Time and date of order created, UTC+0 timing

response_param.name: ^^delivery_time
response_param.desc: Time and date order delivered, UTC+0 timing

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: Total count of orders in the response.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to generate commissionable and trackable share links on behalf of creators. Orders placed through these links will be attributed to the respective creators, who will receive commission earnings accordingly. Also allows the application to retrieve affiliate orders that include the corresponding tracking parameters for accurate attribution and performance analysis.
scope_list.auth_info: Allows the application to generate commissionable and trackable links on behalf of affiliates. Orders placed through these links can be attributed to the respective affiliates, allowing you to allocate commission earnings accordingly. Also allows the application to retrieve affiliate orders that include the corresponding tracking parameters for accurate attribution and performance analysis.
